column4: after I installed ubunt my ethernet card is not recognized by linux or windows. thoughts?
if your ethernet card is not recognized by either linux or windows then it is ***highly**** likely that ethercard is dead
that's what I thought. I sent it in to the manufacturer and they imaged my drive, updated my bios, and shipped it back. it worked under windows until I tried to install linux...
is the ethernet card working right now??? hardware is hardware, its supposed to work, if linux has no drivers or can at least still recognize it
